column6: The stand-alone X-TREME X-MEN FINALE, a former teammate returns to the X-Men fold and the X-Treme team find themselves in a state of transition. Will a return to the Xavier Institute mean changes are in store? Old friends reunite as a new era begins... 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
